QuestData.Title: The Howling Wind
QuestData.Description: This amorphous mass of elemental air is speaking to you in a language that you cannot understand. You believe the language to be the tongue of the elements: Kalimag. Perhaps someone at the Throne of the Elements could shed some insight on this unusual find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find someone at the Throne of the Elements that knows how to speak Kalimag and show them the Howling Wind.
QuestData.RewardText: It is a distress call, $r. An outside force is attempting to subvert the elements.
